function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of novel human Coronavirus due to hypermobility and interconnectedness of transport networks.","Impact":"Potential rapid transmission of the virus.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict travel restrictions and health screening measures.","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, contact tracing apps.","People":"Passengers, transport staff, general public.","Owner":"Government, transport operators, health organizations."},{"Description":"Inadequate existing transport policy approaches to respond to the new challenges posed by COVID-19.","Impact":"Inability to effectively address the transport-related challenges posed by the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Developing and implementing new transport policy approaches that are responsive to the challenges of COVID-19.","Technologies":"Data analytics, smart transportation systems.","People":"Policy makers, transport planners.","Owner":"Government, transportation authorities, urban planners."},{"Description":"Lack of recognition of the important role of individual choice and actions in delivering socially desired transport outcomes in a post-COVID world.","Impact":"Inability to promote responsible transport behavior and choices.","Mitigation":"Promoting awareness and education on responsible transport choices, incentivizing sustainable travel options.","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms, behavioral analytics.","People":"General public, travelers.","Owner":"Government, transportation authorities, advocacy groups."}]}
